ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Would enthusiastically recommend this class. In short: everything you need to know, in clear terms and great detail, about conceptualizing your project in terms of 'research design'; and an opportunity to practice that kind of thinking for the specific requirements of the NSF grant.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Lots of real talk about the kinds of professional issues we don't usually discuss: career trajectories, publishing, grant-writing, IRB applications, etc. Plus, I am much less likely to have a catastrophically disorganized grant-writing process next year thanks to the practice NSF assignment in this class. It was so so helpful to understand this far in advance what will be required to submit a successful proposal.
